name: Curcumin/Turmeric
description: Halal if pure powder, Mushbooh if liquid solvents used, Haram if pork emulsifiers present.
processing_info: Extraction with ethanol possible for liquid forms

additional_context.certifier_guidance: IFANCA considers plant-derived curcumin as halal when in pure form

name: Riboflavin (Vitamin B2)
description: Halal if plant-derived, Haram if from pork liver/kidney.
processing_info: Fermentation or extraction from animal tissues

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Requires manufacturer confirmation of non-porcine source

name: Tartrazine
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Synthetic chemical process with potential solvent use

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Dry powder is acceptable; liquid form requires solvent verification

name: Quinoline Yellow
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (non-water solvents).
processing_info: Chemical synthesis with organic solvents

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Requires verification of solvent sources

name: Sunset Yellow FCF
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Azo coupling reaction with solvent carriers

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Solvent verification required for liquid forms

name: Cochineal/Carminic Acid
description: Prohibited by Hanafi Fiqh.
processing_info: Crushed and boiled insects

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Universally considered Haram due to insect source

name: Carmoisine/Azorubine
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Azo dye synthesis with solvent carriers

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Solvent source verification required

name: Amaranth
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Chemical synthesis with solvent systems

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Liquid forms require solvent verification

name: Ponceau 4R
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Azo dye synthesis with solvent carriers

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify solvent sources for liquid preparations

name: Erythrosine BS
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Chemical synthesis with iodine, potential solvent use

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Solvent verification required for liquid forms

name: Patent Blue V
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Chemical synthesis with solvent systems

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Requires solvent source verification

name: Indigo Carmine
description: Halal if synthetic, Haram if pork glycerin added.
processing_info: Chemical sulfonation process, glycerin carriers

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Critical to verify glycerin source is plant-based

name: Chlorophyll
description: Halal if powder or water/vegetable oil solvent used.
processing_info: Solvent extraction from plant materials

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Acceptable with water or vegetable oil solvents

name: Copper Chlorophyll
description: Halal if powder or water/vegetable oil solvent used.
processing_info: Copper complex formation, solvent extraction

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Water or vegetable oil solvents are acceptable

name: Green S
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Chemical synthesis with solvent carriers

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Solvent source verification required

name: Caramel Color
description: Always permissible.
processing_info: Controlled heating of sugars, sometimes with additives

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Generally accepted as Halal across all certifications

name: Black PN
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Chemical synthesis with solvent systems

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Solvent verification required for liquid forms

name: Vegetable Carbon
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
typical_sources: Charred plant materials (wood, peat, coconut shells)
processing_info: Carbonization of vegetable materials, solvent dispersion

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Plant source is acceptable; verify liquid solvent sources

name: Carotenes
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).
processing_info: Extraction with organic solvents, encapsulation

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Natural sources preferred; verify solvents for liquid forms

name: Annatto
description: Always permissible.
processing_info: Water or oil extraction from seeds

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Universally accepted as Halal from plant source

name: Lycopene
description: Halal if powder/vegetable oil, Haram if pork gelatin used.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify no porcine gelatin is used in encapsulation

name: Lutein
description: Halal if powder, Haram if pork gelatin/glycerin added.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify carriers are plant-based, not porcine

name: Beetroot Red
description: Halal in dry form, Mushbooh in liquid form (verify solvents).

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Plant source acceptable; verify liquid solvent sources

name: Calcium Carbonate
description: Halal if mineral-derived powder, Mushbooh if liquid form.
processing_info: Mining and purification, potential bone source

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify mineral source; avoid bone-derived calcium

description: Always permissible.
processing_info: Mining and chemical processing

name: Iron Oxides
description: Always permissible.

description: Always permissible.

description: Always permissible.

name: Biphenyl

processing_info: Chemical synthesis, potential alcohol solvents

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify no alcohol solvents used in application

name: Hexamine
description: Always permissible.
typical_sources: Chemical synthesis from formaldehyde and ammonia
processing_info: Chemical reaction of formaldehyde with ammonia

name: Sodium Nitrite
description: Always permissible.
processing_info: Chemical reaction of sodium carbonate with nitrogen oxides

name: Sodium Nitrate
description: Always permissible.
processing_info: Mining from mineral deposits or chemical synthesis

description: Always permissible.

name: Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)
description: Always permissible.
processing_info: Fermentation from glucose or extraction from natural sources

description: Always permissible.
processing_info: Neutralization of ascorbic acid with sodium bicarbonate

name: Ascorbyl Palmitate
description: Haram if palmitic acid from pork fat.
typical_sources: Ester of ascorbic acid and palmitic acid
processing_info: Esterification process with palmitic acid

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify palmitic acid source is plant-based, not porcine

name: Tocopherols
description: Haram if from pork fat.

name: Propyl Gallate
description: Always permissible.

description: From plant sources only.

name: Butylated Hydroxytoluene (BHT)

name: Lecithin

name: Sodium Lactate
description: Halal if lactic acid non-dairy.

description: Always permissible.

name: Monosodium Glutamate (MSG)
description: Mushbooh, Halal if all ingredients including culture media from Halal source, Haram if media is from pork fat.
typical_sources: Fermentation of molasses, sugar beets, or sugarcane
processing_info: Microbial fermentation with potential animal-derived nutrients

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify fermentation media is plant-based, not animal-derived

name: Monopotassium Glutamate
description: Mushbooh, Halal if all ingredients including culture media from Halal source, Haram if media is from pork fat.
processing_info: Microbial fermentation with potassium neutralization

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify fermentation media is plant-based, not animal-derived

name: Calcium Glutamate
description: Mushbooh, Halal if all ingredients including culture media from Halal source, Haram if media is from pork fat.
processing_info: Microbial fermentation with calcium compounds

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify fermentation media is plant-based and calcium source is mineral

name: Monoammonium Glutamate
description: Mushbooh, Halal if all ingredients including culture media from Halal source, Haram if media is from pork fat.
processing_info: Microbial fermentation with ammonium compounds

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify fermentation media is plant-based and magnesium source is mineral

name: Sodium Guanylate
description: Halal if obtained from sardines or baker's yeast extract. Mushbooh if made from brewer yeast extract, a by-product of beer making.
processing_info: Extraction from fish or yeast, or microbial fermentation

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify source is plant-based yeast or fish (non-porcine), not brewer's yeast

name: Potassium Guanylate
description: Halal if obtained from sardines or baker's yeast extract. Mushbooh if made from brewer yeast extract, a by-product of beer making.
processing_info: Extraction from fish or yeast with potassium neutralization

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify source is plant-based yeast or fish (non-porcine), not brewer's yeast

name: Calcium Guanylate
description: Halal if obtained from sardines or baker's yeast extract. Mushbooh if made from brewer yeast extract, a by-product of beer making.
processing_info: Extraction from fish or yeast with calcium neutralization

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify source is plant-based yeast or fish (non-porcine), not brewer's yeast

name: Sodium Inosinate
description: Halal if obtained from sardines. Mushbooh if made from brewer yeast extract, a by-product of beer making. Haram if extracted from pig meat.
typical_sources: Fish, meat extracts, yeast, microbial fermentation
processing_info: Extraction from animal tissues or microbial fermentation

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify source is fish-based or plant-based yeast, not animal meat or brewer's yeast

name: Potassium Inosinate
description: Halal if obtained from sardines. Mushbooh if made from brewer yeast extract, a by-product of beer making. Haram if extracted from pig meat.
typical_sources: Fish, meat extracts, yeast, microbial fermentation
processing_info: Extraction from animal tissues or microbial fermentation with potassium neutralization

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify source is fish-based or plant-based yeast, not animal meat or brewer's yeast

name: Calcium Inosinate
description: Halal if obtained from sardines. Mushbooh if made from brewer yeast extract, a by-product of beer making. Haram if extracted from pig meat.
typical_sources: Fish, meat extracts, yeast, microbial fermentation
processing_info: Extraction from animal tissues or microbial fermentation with calcium neutralization

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify source is fish-based or plant-based yeast, not animal meat or brewer's yeast

name: Sodium 5'-Ribonucleotide
description: Mushbooh, it is a combination of E627 and E631.
typical_sources: Combination of sodium guanylate and sodium inosinate
processing_info: Blend of disodium guanylate and disodium inosinate

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify both components are from Halal sources (fish or plant-based yeast)

name: Maltol
description: Always permissible.
typical_sources: Natural occurrence in roasted malt, pine needles, or synthetic production

name: Ethyl Maltol
description: Always permissible.
processing_info: Chemical synthesis from maltol

name: Glycine

processing_info: Chemical synthesis or hydrolysis of proteins

name: Dimethylpolysiloxane
description: Always permissible.

name: Beeswax
description: Always permissible.

name: Carnauba Wax
description: Always permissible.

name: Shellac

name: Mineral Hydrocarbons
description: Always permissible.

name: Refined Microcrystalline Wax

description: Always permissible.

name: Chlorine
description: Always permissible.

name: Chicken Breast
description: Lean, boneless cut from organic, free-range chickens raised without antibiotics or hormones.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; no artificial additives or preservatives

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Must be Zabiha slaughtered by Muslim with Bismillah. Organic certification must include halal practices.

name: Ground Beef
description: Finely chopped beef from organically raised, grass-fed cattle.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; grinding process with no additives

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Requires Zabiha slaughter and verification of organic feed that is free from animal by-products.

name: Lamb Chops
description: Tender cuts from organic, pasture-raised lambs, known for rich flavor.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; natural aging process

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal when Zabiha slaughtered. Popular in Middle Eastern and South Asian cuisines.

name: Turkey Breast
description: Lean, white meat from organically raised turkeys, free from antibiotics.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; minimal processing

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Must be Zabiha slaughtered. Verify no cross-contamination with non-halal processing equipment.

name: Beef Steak
description: Premium cuts from grass-fed, organically raised cattle, various cuts available.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; dry-aged or vacuum-sealed

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Requires Zabiha slaughter. Aging process must not involve non-halal substances.

name: Chicken Thighs
description: Juicy, flavorful cuts from organic chickens, higher fat content than breast meat.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; may be bone-in or boneless

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Must be Zabiha slaughtered. Popular in various cultural cuisines for its flavor.

name: Ground Turkey
description: Lean alternative to ground beef, from organically raised turkeys.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; grinding process with no additives

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Requires Zabiha slaughter. Lower fat content makes it popular for health-conscious consumers.

name: Duck Breast
description: Rich, flavorful meat from organically raised ducks, known for its distinctive taste.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; often scored for fat rendering

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Must be Zabiha slaughtered. Higher fat content requires proper cooking techniques.

name: Veal Cutlets
description: Tender meat from organically raised young calves, known for delicate texture.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; humane raising practices

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Requires Zabiha slaughter. Verify ethical raising practices meet both organic and halal standards.

name: Whole Chicken
description: Complete organic chicken, perfect for roasting and various cooking methods.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; may be air-chilled or water-chilled

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Must be Zabiha slaughtered. Whole bird allows for various cooking methods and cultural preparations.

name: Beef Roast
description: Large cuts from organic cattle, ideal for slow cooking and roasting.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; may be tied for even cooking

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Requires Zabiha slaughter. Larger cuts are often used for special occasions and family gatherings.

name: Cornish Hens
description: Young, small chickens from organic sources, known for tender meat.
processing_info: Zabiha slaughter required; individual portion size

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Must be Zabiha slaughtered. Popular for elegant meals and special presentations.

name: Whole Milk
description: Unprocessed milk from organically raised cows, containing natural fats and nutrients.
processing_info: Minimally processed, pasteurized or ultra-pasteurized; no artificial additives

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal from Zabiha-slaughtered animals. Requires verification of animal treatment and feed.

name: Greek Yogurt
description: Thick, creamy yogurt made by straining whey from cultured milk, resulting in higher protein content.
processing_info: Cultured with bacterial strains, strained to remove whey

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if made from Zabiha milk and bacterial cultures are halal-certified.

name: Cheddar Cheese
description: Firm, natural cheese made from organic milk, aged for flavor development.
processing_info: Curdling with microbial rennet or enzymes, pressing, and aging

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Status depends on rennet source. Microbial/vegetable rennet is halal; animal rennet requires Zabiha verification.

name: Butter
description: Dairy product made by churning fresh cream, consisting of butterfat and milk proteins.
processing_info: Churning of cream, may contain salt or be unsalted

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if made from Zabiha milk. Verify no non-halal additives.

name: Heavy Cream
description: High-fat cream portion of milk, containing 36-40% milk fat.
processing_info: Separation and pasteurization; may be ultra-pasteurized

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if from Zabiha milk. Check for stabilizers or additives.

name: Sour Cream
description: Cultured dairy product made by fermenting regular cream with lactic acid bacteria.
processing_info: Fermentation with bacterial cultures, may contain stabilizers

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if from Zabiha milk and bacterial cultures are halal. Verify additives.

name: Cottage Cheese
description: Fresh cheese curds with a mild flavor, typically with varying cream content.
processing_info: Curdling with acid or rennet, draining, may contain cream dressing

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Status depends on coagulant used. Acid-set is halal; rennet-set requires verification.

name: Cream Cheese
description: Soft, mild-tasting fresh cheese made from milk and cream.
processing_info: Culturing with lactic acid bacteria, stabilizers may be added

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Verify coagulant source and any stabilizers. Microbial cultures preferred.

name: Buttermilk
description: Fermented dairy drink, traditionally the liquid left after churning butter.
processing_info: Culturing with lactic acid bacteria

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if from Zabiha milk and bacterial cultures are halal-certified.

name: Kefir
description: Probiotic fermented milk drink made with kefir grains, containing multiple strains of bacteria and yeast.
processing_info: Fermentation with kefir grains (symbiotic culture of bacteria and yeast)

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if from Zabiha milk. Natural fermentation process is acceptable.

name: Ghee
description: Clarified butter with milk solids removed, having a high smoke point and nutty flavor.
processing_info: Heating butter to remove water and milk solids

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if made from Zabiha butter. Popular in many Muslim cultures.

name: Ricotta Cheese
description: Italian whey cheese with a creamy texture and mild, slightly sweet flavor.
processing_info: Heating whey left from cheese production, acid coagulation

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Generally halal as it's acid-coagulated from whey, not using rennet.

name: Rice
description: Staple cereal grain widely consumed worldwide.
processing_info: Usually hulled and polished; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if free from contamination.

name: Wheat
description: Cereal grain used for flour and bread products.
processing_info: Milled into flour; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if free from contamination.

name: Oats
description: Cereal grain used for porridge and baking.
processing_info: Rolled or steel-cut; ensure no additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Barley
description: Cereal grain used in food and beverages.
processing_info: Pearled or whole; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if free from contamination.

name: Corn
description: Cereal grain used as food and feed.
processing_info: Can be whole, cornmeal, or flour; avoid non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Quinoa
description: Pseudo-cereal grain rich in protein.
processing_info: Rinse before cooking; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Millet
description: Small-seeded cereal grain.
processing_info: Whole or flour; avoid additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Buckwheat
description: Pseudo-cereal used in flour and porridge.
processing_info: Whole or ground; ensure no haram additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Spelt
description: Ancient grain used in baking and cooking.
processing_info: Milled to flour; avoid non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Chia Seeds
description: Seed rich in omega-3 fatty acids and protein.
processing_info: Cleaned and dried; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Flaxseeds
description: Seed rich in fiber and omega-3 fatty acids.
processing_info: Cleaned and dried; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Hemp Seeds
description: Nutrient-rich seeds high in protein and healthy fats.
processing_info: Hulled or whole; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Apples
description: Fresh fruit, commonly eaten raw or used in cooking.
processing_info: Washed and sorted; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Bananas
description: Fresh tropical fruit eaten raw or in desserts.
processing_info: Ripe or raw; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Oranges
description: Citrus fruit consumed fresh or as juice.
processing_info: Washed and sorted; free from additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Grapes
description: Fresh fruit eaten raw or used in desserts.
processing_info: Washed; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Carrots
description: Root vegetable commonly used raw or cooked.
processing_info: Washed and sorted; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Potatoes
description: Starchy tuber used in cooking.
processing_info: Washed and peeled; free from additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Spinach
description: Leafy green vegetable, eaten raw or cooked.
processing_info: Washed; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Dates
description: Dried fruit commonly consumed as snack.
processing_info: Pitted and dried; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Raisins
description: Dried grapes used as snack or in baking.
processing_info: Sun-dried or dehydrated; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Tomatoes
description: Fresh fruit commonly used in cooking or sauces.
processing_info: Washed; free from non-halal additives.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if pure.

name: Vitamin C
description: A water-soluble vitamin used as a nutrient supplement and antioxidant.
typical_sources: Citrus fruits, synthetic fermentation from glucose
processing_info: Produced via glucose fermentation using microbial processes.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if not derived from alcohol-based fermentation.

name: Vitamin D3
description: Fat-soluble vitamin important for bone health.
typical_sources: Lanolin from sheeps wool, some plant-based sources
processing_info: Extracted from lanolin or made via lichen fermentation.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Plant-derived preferred for halal certainty.

name: Calcium
description: Essential mineral for bone and teeth health.
processing_info: Usually purified from mineral or plant sources.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Ensure no animal-derived binders.

name: Iron
description: Essential mineral for hemoglobin production and oxygen transport.
processing_info: Usually synthesized from mineral salts.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Ensure no animal co-precipitates.

name: Magnesium
description: Essential mineral for nerve and muscle function.
processing_info: Purified from mineral or plant sources.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if plant/mineral sourced.

name: L-Lysine
description: Essential amino acid used for protein synthesis.
processing_info: Produced via microbial fermentation from plant sugars.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if not derived from animal sources.

name: L-Leucine
description: Branched-chain amino acid important for muscle repair.
processing_info: Synthesized via plant-based fermentation.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if plant sourced.

name: Whey Protein Isolate
description: Protein derived from milk, used in sports and nutrition products.
processing_info: Filtered and purified; ensure halal-certified milk source.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if milk source is certified.

name: Glucose
description: Simple sugar used as sweetener and energy source.
processing_info: Derived from corn starch hydrolysis; free from non-halal enzymes.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if plant sourced.

name: Maltodextrin
description: Starch-derived carbohydrate used as filler or sweetener.
processing_info: Hydrolyzed from starch sources; verify halal enzymes.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if plant sourced.

name: Omega-3 Fatty Acids
description: Polyunsaturated fatty acids essential for heart and brain health.
processing_info: Refined from oils; ensure halal-certified fish or plant source.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Plant/algae source preferred for halal certainty.

name: Stearic Acid
description: Saturated fatty acid used in food and supplements.
processing_info: Refined from fats; source determines halal status.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Plant-derived preferred for halal.

name: Gelatin
description: Protein obtained by partial hydrolysis of collagen from animal sources.
typical_sources: Cattle bones, pig skins, fish scales
processing_info: Derived from boiling animal collagen. Halal status depends on source and slaughter method.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Requires confirmation of source and halal certification.

name: Lecithin
description: Natural emulsifier used to stabilize mixtures.
processing_info: Extracted from plant seeds, sometimes using ethanol or hexane.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if plant-derived and no alcohol used.

name: Cellulose
description: Plant-derived fiber used as thickener, filler, or anti-caking agent.
processing_info: Purified from plant fibers; generally safe and non-reactive.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Plant-derived cellulose is generally halal.

name: Glycerin
description: Humectant and solvent used in food and pharmaceuticals.
typical_sources: Vegetable oils, animal fats, or synthetic
processing_info: Source-dependent; plant-based is halal, animal-based requires certification.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal status depends on source.

name: Enzymes
description: Proteins that catalyze reactions in food processing.
processing_info: Source-dependent; microbial/plant enzymes generally halal.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if non-animal or halal-certified.

name: Propylene Glycol
description: Humectant and solvent in food and beverages.
processing_info: Produced synthetically, generally considered halal.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if synthetic and pure.

name: Silicon Dioxide
description: Anti-caking agent used to prevent clumping in powdered foods.
processing_info: Inert mineral; generally considered halal.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Generally accepted as halal.

name: Calcium Carbonate
description: Mineral used as acidity regulator, calcium supplement, or anti-caking agent.
processing_info: Generally mineral-derived; considered halal.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if mineral-derived.

name: Sodium Bicarbonate
description: Used as leavening agent and acidity regulator.
processing_info: Generally synthetic or mineral-derived; considered halal.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if mineral/synthetic.

name: Tartaric Acid
description: Acidulant used in baking and beverages.
processing_info: Can be extracted from natural sources; generally halal.

additional_context.certifier_guidance: Halal if plant-derived.
